name: Plant-Based Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wraps
description: Thank you, Tracey Van Der Valk, for this plant-based recipe!

ingredients.name: Nourish Broth Mix or Vegetable Broth Mix
Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wrap Seasoning or Chicken Fried Rice Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, place rice, 2 cups water and broth mix; cover. Microwave 6 min, then set aside in a separate bowl.
In Multipurpose Steamer, place seasoning, meat substitute, peppers, mangoes, remaining 1 tbsp water, sesame oil, and soy sauce. Gently mix to combine. Microwave, 6 min.
Meanwhile, cut lettuce into four wedges, remove stem ends and gently peel the wedge leaves off two at a time to create strong, sturdy, crunchy boats for your filling.
Layer rice, then protein mixture on lettuce. Top with extra toppings, if desired.
tips: Swap plant-based meat substitute with 1 can (19 oz/540 ml) chickpeas, drained and rinsed.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wrap Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: While those restaurant lettuce wraps you enjoy are delicious, they also come with a hefty dose of calories and sodium and a high price tag! We created Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wraps to solve that problem! Packed with notes of garlic and ginger, with a touch of heat, mix this tasty low-sodium blend with the protein of your choice and pile it on crispy lettuce leaves for a meal that clocks in at around $3/serving.

products.name: Chicken Fried Rice Seasoning (Pkg of 3)
summary: Plain white rice has its place at the table, but when it’s time to kick dinner up a notch, Chicken Fried Rice is the answer. Make a mountain of crispy fragrant rice – with notes of garlic, ginger, chives, and chillies – packed with protein and amplified by crunchy coleslaw.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
